title: A Syrian Photographer's Life In Civil War
teaser: Saeed al Batal is a Syrian who has witnessed the destruction of his country, city and most recently, his home over the last four years. He is among the millions whose lives have been changed forever by the civil war there. He tells us what daily life is like inside Syria.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
